pa: No! Fuck! Don't you get it?

en: Przestań! Nie rozumiesz? Nie mogłam ci powiedzieć prawdy.
pa: Don't you fucking understand? I couldn't tell you the truth, Adrian.
vi: Thôi đi! Anh không hiểu à? Tôi không thể nói sự thật.

pa: 'Cause I didn't wanna lose you.
vi: Tôi không muốn mất anh.

pa: I love you.
vi: Tôi yêu anh.

pa: -What the fuck are you talking about? -I knew from the start they weren't here.

en: Od razu wiedziałam, że ich tu nie ma.
Wywiozłam nas tutaj, bo musiałam nas chronić, rozumiesz?

en: Jak na początku się zorientowałam, że…

vi: Lúc đầu, khi tôi nhận ra mình…

en: że natknęłam się w lesie na typów, którzy obrabowali bank,
pa: that I'd stumbled across the people who robbed that bank, I was so psyched!
vi: tình cờ gặp được bọn cướp ngân hàng trong rừng, tôi cũng đã rất vui.

pa: I was like, "What a fucking great opportunity."

en: Ale nawet nie wiesz, ile miałam szczęścia, że im uciekłam.
pa: But you have no idea how lucky I was to escape.
vi: Nhưng rồi phải may mắn lắm tôi mới thoát khỏi chúng.

en: To jest, kurwa, najgorsza banda pojebów.
pa: They're a band of total fucking freaks.

en: Są jak w jebanym zegarku, czaisz?

en: To jest jakaś, kurwa, maszyna do zabijania.

pa: I managed to eavesdrop on them for a bit.

en: Kurwa, jest ten Wojtek, co nie?
pa: Fuck! There's this Wojtek, right?
vi: Có tay Wojtek này, anh biết không?

en: Stary, ja w życiu nie widziałam tylu mięśni naraz.
pa: Shit. I've never seen that many muscles.

en: Leon i Klara. To jest chyba małżeństwo.
pa: Leon and Klara. I think they might be married.

en: On jest kompletnym pojebem. Niczego się nie boi.
pa: He's a total fucking psycho. Not afraid of anything.

pa: -She comes up with all their plans. -Check over there.

en: Zimna, wyrachowana suka. I jeszcze jest ta…

en: Dianka. Kurwa, wygląda, jakby miała 11 lat,
pa: Diana. She looks about 11 years old, but really she's almost 30, yeah?

en: a tak naprawdę jest pod trzydziestkę.
I ona jest mózgiem całej tej grupy, kumasz?

pa: Ow.
